name: Rotaro
description:
You don't have to own your wardrobe to be known for your wardrobe. 

Rotaro exists to change the makeup of our wardrobes, and the fabric of the industry they come from (pun most certainly intended). We give our community the ability to rent great, cult fashion pieces for the price of a high-street dress.

team.name: Georgie Hyatt
team.bioHtml: Founder @Rotaro • Worked at @WGSN

jobs.title: Content & Partnerships Lead
jobs.description:
We're looking for Rotaro's first marketing hire! A multi-disciplinary creative who is as comfortable creating best-in-class visual assets as they are writing sharp content & copy. The successful candiate will become an integral part of the gang from the get-go, and will be leading the charge on both the long-term strategy and day-to-day execution of all things design, content and parterships. The role reports directly to Rotaro's Co-founder/Creative Director.

This is an incredible role for someone who is looking to make a real impact withing a budding startup. 

**About you ––––**

- Fashion industry experience is not a must-have, however we live and breathe design, art and culture so a deep interest in these is critical. 
- You have 2-4 years content/marketing experience at a consumer brand or agency.
- You are an incredibly articulate storyteller, able to convey messages across many channels.
- You're fully comfortable with Adobe Creative Suite (Illustrator in particular)
- Exceptional copywriting skills
- You understnad how to engage communities via social media, and are great with people.
- You're scrappy and can do a lot with a tight budget.
- You are comfortable using data and metrics (G-suite, Facebook/Instagram back-end) to measure the impact of your work.
- You’re incredibly curious and are always finding opportunities to learn new things.
- You are a people person (and maybe even a bit of a chatty kathy). 
- You are not afraid to think outside the box and go against the grain. 
- You are unphased by tight deadlines and fast turnarounds.
- You know your way around iPhone photogrpahy. 

**Responsibilities –––––**

- Develop a content marketing plan based on clear objectives and execute against it. 
- Create compelling, cross-channel content, stories and campaigns.
- Seek out synergic brand partnerships, and manage these successfully. 
- Manage all social channels (with a specific focus on Instagram), in line with out tone of voice and aesthetic guidelines. 
- Write copy for social, emails and web.
- Identify opportunities to engage with our communities offline (think outside the box!)
- Work with influenceurs and customers to create cool and innovative user generated content that helps potential customers understand what we do.
- Help plan & execute lifestyle shoots for new product drops. 

If you tick some but not all of these boxes, but are really eager to teach yourself new skills on the job, please apply!  We believe great companies are built by investing in people, not CVs. 

Salary: £25k p/a 

To apply, continue via Angel.co, or send a CV & cover letter to info@rotaro.co.uk
